item.description:
Details (locations, times, etc.) to be forthcoming but please mark the full day your calendar to help out up in New Hampshire with sign holding, vote watching, helping voters get to the polls, etc.,


"Please add the following to your comments:
1.Driver or Passenger

2.City (So we can match drivers and passengers)

3.Time available (could be a long day early polling and late
victory party)

1. Driver
2. Somerville (for example)
3. All Day".

UPDATE:

For those who can help out on Janaury 8 this information is from Joshua Baker. Contact him to get plugged into specific cities for the day.

Information for positions available in Southwest NH:


Keene, NH - Wards 1-5
Hinsdale, NH - Ward 1
Rindge, NH - Ward 1
Swanzey, NH - Ward 1

Claremont, NH - Wards 1-3
Newport, NH - Ward 1
Charlestown, NH - Ward 1


Very Responsible individuals to sit and monitor inside of polling places in Keene, NH to identify Pro-Ron Paul voters as they enter each polling place. Responsible for overhearing the Supervisor of the Checklist and to mark off those who have arrived and who are on our list of supporters.

Please, only responsible individuals who are willing to sit and listen without disturbing the voting process. Specific regulations are to be followed. More information, contact: Joshua Baker (603) 545-4351 or Joshua.Baker@ronpaul2008.com.


Also a group who will have a special lists of Ron Paul supporters who will be responsible for driving door to door and inquiring if voters have participated in Jan. 8th elections. Very simple job with great importance. This is available in each of the cities listed above.



All in all, Volunteers to help with each of these polling places and individuals to drive door to door and remind voters. If there are any questions or interest, please call Joshua Baker (603) 545-4351 or Joshua.Baker@ronpaul2008.com.



Joshua Baker
Ron Paul 2008 - Field Organizer
Southwest New Hampshire
joshua.baker@ronpaul2008.com
item.why: This is the most important day of Campaign 2008 in New Hampshire
item.name: NH PRIMARY DAY: GET OUT THE VOTE!
